World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 29 日星期一 17:31:05 GMT 120
Palestinians in Gaza see UNRWA funding cuts as 'death sentence'Palestinian mother Mazouza Hassan stood aghast at the potential threats to the work of the U.N. agency that handles most aid in Gaza after some Western states suspended funding to it over allegations employees took part in the Hamas attack on Israel. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 17:08:56 GMT DH6CAHHZ7RMQXJERG2NT2QFEOY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinians-gaza-see-unrwa-funding-cuts-death-sentence-2024-01-29/Fadi Shana, Ibraheemabu Mustafa世界中东
Prince Harry wants case against Mirror resolved as soon as possible - lawyersPrince Harry wants London's High Court to resolve the remainder of his lawsuit against Britain's Mirror Group Newspapers as soon as possible following the ruling in his favour at the end of last year, his legal team said on Monday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 16:59:16 GMT H5ZU7BWMBNI7XNLYKYGRLCCOMQ https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/prince-harry-wants-case-against-mirror-resolved-soon-possible-lawyers-2024-01-29/Michael Holden世界英国
ICC prosecutor believes warring parties committing war crimes in DarfurThe International Criminal Court's chief prosecutor told the U.N. Security Council on Monday "there are grounds to believe" both Sudan's regular army and the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF) are committing war crimes in Darfur at present. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 16:39:18 GMT H57ZVHL2GNLS3JLOF54J2C4VC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/icc-prosecutor- believes-warring-parties-committing-war-crimes-darfur-2024-01-29/Michelle Nichols世界非洲
Nearly 100 dead or missing migrants in Mediterranean so far in 2024 -IOMNearly 100 migrants have died or disappeared in the central and eastern Mediterranean since the beginning of 2024, more than double the toll recorded last year during the same period, the U.N. migration agency said on Monday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 16:33:23 GMT UCHNDX6QPZPH5PQBDJYZ6Q4CHE https://www.reuters.com/world/nearly-100-dead-or-missing-migrants-mediterranean-so-far-2024-iom-2024-01-29/Reuters世界
Freed Israeli hostage fears for resilience of those still held in GazaAn Israeli woman who spent 55 days in Hamas captivity in Gaza said on Monday that every second of that time felt like eternity and she feared for the resilience of the more than 100 remaining hostages abducted on Oct. 7. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 16:30:37 GMT O6TDZHNIE5MRTLM3SV2N53MBOM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/freed-israeli-hostage-fears-resilience-those-still-held-gaza-2024-01-29/Leonardo Benassatto, Michal Yaakov Itzhaki世界中东
Exclusive: IMF, Argentina to defer final $44 bln loan review to NovemberThe International Monetary Fund will allow Argentina to defer the last review of its $44 billion loan by two months, giving the government more time to apply reforms and potentially negotiate a new program, according to people with direct knowledge. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 16:26:35 GMT B7KD7XQ5E5O7NIETTGYZXLOLII https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/imf-argentina-defer-final-44-bln-loan-review-november-2024-01-29/Jorgelina Rosario世界美洲
Senior US Treasury official travels to Iraq as Washington takes action against bankThe U.S. Treasury Department's top sanctions official traveled to Baghdad on Sunday, a Treasury spokesperson said, as Washington seeks to counter Iran's sanctions evasion in Iraq and bring the country's financial sector in line with international standards. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 16:09:36 GMT YR63HLQTDBOZ3E4EOVFQY2I7B4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/senior-us-treasury-official-travels-iraq-washington-takes-action-against-bank-2024-01-29/Daphne Psaledakis世界中东
Pentagon chief vows 'all necessary actions' after US troop deathsU.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin on Monday vowed that the United States would take "all necessary actions" to defend its troops after a drone attack by Iran-backed militants that killed three U.S. forces and wounded dozens more. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 16:04:46 GMT U2RIWHMUSZNPPBEAHGT3LWKTTA https://www.reuters.com/world/austin-vows-all-necessary-actions-after-us-troop-deaths-2024-01-29/Idrees Ali, Phil Stewart世界
Albania’s top court allows Italy migrant pactAlbania's top court gave the green light on Monday to a deal letting Italy build migrant processing centres on Albanian territory, a scheme that has faced criticism from opposition and rights groups. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 15:49:47 GMT 4MSUPXFEINNBZNPYZCQCPF3PJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/albanias-highest-court-rules-favour-migrant-deal-with-italy-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Hungarian opposition seeks extraordinary session of parliament on Sweden NATO bidHungarian opposition parties submitted a motion on Monday calling for an extraordinary session of parliament on Feb. 5 to ratify Sweden's application to join NATO. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 15:45:55 GMT PKA2CTX7NJIHFAVLCTXRCPZ73M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungarian-opposition-seeks-extraordinary-session-parliament-sweden-nato-bid-2024-01-29/Boldizsar Gyori世界欧洲
Mexico's ruling party presidential hopeful holds 16-point lead - pollThe presidential candidate from Mexico's ruling leftist party has the support of 48% of voters, a 16-point lead compared to the main opposition coalition hopeful, about four months ahead of the election, according to a new poll released on Monday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 15:25:42 GMT WGHZDSP6YROSJEJ4HLRRCUSNHI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexicos-ruling-party-presidential-hopeful-holds-16-point-lead-poll-2024-01-29/Reuters世界美洲
